title: Border, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element work with needle lace, reticella style
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Border fragment with diamond-shaped areas filled in with needle lace. Tiny openwork squares are grouped in between diamond-shaped areas. Pointed lace border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 16th century.
16th century. Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element work with needle lace, reticella style. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-91.
